title: Ancient Honey Cakes (Rice Flour Cookies with Nuts or Poppy Seeds)
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet.

Step 2: Beat butter and honey in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add eggs a little at a time, mixing well after each addition. Add rice flour, baking powder, and cardamom to butter mixture; mix until just combined. Roll dough into small balls, about 1 heaping teaspoon each.
Step 3: Pour hemp seeds into a small bowl. Press the top half of each dough ball into seeds. Transfer dough balls, seed-side up, to the baking sheet and gently press to 1/4-inch thickness.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 20 minutes.
